mapper.select: select * from Home where member_email= #{member_email}
select * from (select * from home order by home_seq) where rownum = 1
select * from home where home_seq = #{home_seq}
select * from home_pic where home_seq = #{seq} order by home_pic_seq

select * from( select start_day + level -1 days from( select to_date(#{start}, 'yyyy/mm/dd') start_day, to_date(#{end}, 'yyyy/mm/dd') end_day from dual) connect by start_day + level -1 <= end_day) order by days asc
select home_blocked_date from home where home_seq = #{home_seq}
select * from member m, reservation r, home h where m.member_email = r.member_email and h.home_seq = r.home_seq and r.host_email = #{host_email} order by reserv_date desc
select * from message mg, member m, home h where mg.fromid = m.member_email and mg.home_seq = h.home_seq
select * from guest_review g, host_review h where g.g_review_seq = h.g_review_seq and h.home_seq IN (select home_seq from home where member_email = #{member_email})
select * from host_review where host_seq = #{host_seq}
select G_REVIEW_SATISFACTION , count(G_REVIEW_SATISFACTION) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_SATISFACTION having G_REVIEW_SATISFACTION in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_SATISFACTION desc
select G_REVIEW_ACCURACY , count(G_REVIEW_ACCURACY) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_ACCURACY having G_REVIEW_ACCURACY in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_ACCURACY desc
select G_REVIEW_CLEANLINESS , count(G_REVIEW_CLEANLINESS) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_CLEANLINESS having G_REVIEW_CLEANLINESS in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_CLEANLINESS desc
select G_REVIEW_CHECKIN , count(G_REVIEW_CHECKIN) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_CHECKIN having G_REVIEW_CHECKIN in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_CHECKIN desc
select G_REVIEW_AMENITIES, count(G_REVIEW_AMENITIES) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_AMENITIES having G_REVIEW_AMENITIES in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_AMENITIES desc

select G_REVIEW_COMMUNICATION , count(G_REVIEW_COMMUNICATION) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_COMMUNICATION having G_REVIEW_COMMUNICATION in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_COMMUNICATION desc
select G_REVIEW_LOCATION , count(G_REVIEW_LOCATION) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_LOCATION having G_REVIEW_LOCATION in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_LOCATION desc
select G_REVIEW_VALUE, count(G_REVIEW_VALUE) as count from guest_review group by G_REVIEW_VALUE having G_REVIEW_VALUE in(5,4,3,2,1) order by G_REVIEW_VALUE desc
select * from home order by home_seq

select * from home where home_people >= #{people} and home_price between #{minMoney} and #{maxMoney}
and
home_type = #{type} or
and home_blocked_date is null or
home_blocked_date not like '%${type}%' and
select * from bed where home_seq = #{home_seq}
